title: My problem with Tryn
body:
He just feels impossible to deal with if someone else feeds him.

I usually am winning lane, up a few kills, but someone somewhere dies a few times to tryn.  He is one of those champs where if a bad lane feeds him, even if I'm personally doing well, I feel like there is nothing I can do to stop him.

This is likely a bronze problem since getting your team to work together is a nightmare, but as a solo player once someone feeds tryn its incredibly frustrating to deal with.

Even if I could have potentially killed him, he ults and usually can win that fight.

Not saying he is op or anything, just feels impossible to deal with if someone on your team feeds him.

just play teemo. get frozen mallet and kite him he cant do much at all against teemo

You didn't really read my post very thoroughly. I don't have a problem with him in lane.

I have a problem when someone ELSE feeds him and I can't deal with him.

Don't skim posts and comment, because them you lack the necessary information to make a comment.

I had assumed you were laning against him and he roamed. If you mean youre playing in another lane and your top laner feeds him, then you need to out split push him. I used to have that very problem but i learned to pressure harder than him, and he WILL come deal with you. All trynds think theyre 1v1 gods but if you can kite him , no matter how fed he is, he becomes useless. I havent struggled against a trynd in like 2 years. To me, he feels like teemo. Useless if you dont play into their games.

To be honest, any champion that get's fed is going to give you a headache. 

Zed will give you a headache if he get's early kills, Fizz will as well. 
Pretty much any champ that gets ahead gets a power buffer. 

On the contrary, I'd say Tryndamere is easier to deal with than many champs even if he get's ahead because he can literally do nothing to you unless he's smashing you head in with autos, unlike a fed mage, assassin or adc, who will just delete you in a the blink of an eye. 

Or a fed tank, who will soak your entire teams damage while doing good damage and allowing his team to mop the floor with you. 

Tryndamere can neither burst you from a distance, ravage you with dps from a distance or just insta assassinate you with abilites, he needs to connect to do anything.

Try to identify your win conditions. Either send 2 to kill him top or 5v4 against the rest of his team to win a team fight. It is really situational, which is why beating Trynd takes some good map awareness/decision making.

Items that can help counter him are {{item:3143}} and {{item:3512}}.
